attributes.action: use all of his influence to convince the organising committee of the London 2012 Olympic Games to scrap the proposed logo and commission a new one.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The logo as unveiled is a jarring, distasteful mess, and we feel that the London Olympic Games deserve better.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
